data.actual_result: Icons sometimes move when you hover on the corresponding option, they are blurry, extra pixels and other odd behavior is shown
data.short_description: Icons from server drop down menu exhibit odd behavior ( really well shown on 80 zoom)
data.steps_to_repro: - Change your zoom level to 80 -  Be in many servers  - Go to each server and click their name  - Look at the drop down menu
